definition: Luqiao district of Taizhou city 台州市[Tai1 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang
Luqiao district of Taizhou city 台州市[Tai1 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang

sentences.english: The railway bridge has already been completed.
A simple method to predict earthquake damage to railroad bridge is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種簡單的預測鐵路橋樑地震震害的方法。

sentences.english: A bridge on the Atlantic Road in Norway.
sentences.chinese: 絕路橋坐落於挪威的大西洋之路。

sentences.english: Obama wants to spend big bucks fixing things like railways and bridges.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬總統打算在鐵路橋樑這些建設上花費巨資。

sentences.english: Cooperating with CRBC, constructing projects of road, Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 與中國路橋合作，承建道路，橋樑工程。

sentences.english: The road toll is higher during holiday periods .
sentences.chinese: 在節假日期間路橋費比以往要貴。

sentences.english: This paper describes the application of shallow seismic refraction wave method to the exploration of foundation for railway bridges.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了淺層地震折射波法在鐵路橋基礎勘查中的應用。

sentences.english: How long will it take you to complete a railway bridge?
sentences.chinese: 你們要花多少時間才能架起一座鐵路橋呢？

sentences.english: I shelter under the stone arch of the road bridge for half an hour's quiet reflection.
sentences.chinese: 我躲在公路橋的石拱下靜靜思考了半個小時。

sentences.english: Most road bridges have piers rising out of the vally.
sentences.chinese: 很多公路橋的橋墩是從河谷裏建造起來的。

sentences.english: A new rail bridge won't be finished until next year at the earliest.
sentences.chinese: 新的鐵路橋至少要在明年才能修好。

sentences.english: JIANGGONG road is the model for the seismic analysis and calculations.
sentences.chinese: 特別對建工路橋進行抗震計算分析。

sentences.english: The lower is the dual-line railway bridge.
They lived in an old run-down hotel by the railway bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他們住在鐵路橋旁邊一家又破又舊的旅館裏。

sentences.english: It is impossible to build up a railway bridge in such a short time.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣短時間內要架起一座鐵路橋是不可能的。

sentences.english: Also vigorously the development of international road and bridge transport.
sentences.chinese: 天津港還大力發展國際路橋運輸。
